body:
It should be implemented as a two-sided card, see [1].

Currently, in can be cast for free, while it should only be castable when transforming Soul Seizer.

[1] http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=242498
author: [go.spam....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/113385897513702662113/)
title: Ghastly Haunting implemented incorrectly

comments.body:
Is implemented as a double-sided card. Random deck generator needs editing to prevent 'hidden' cards from being added. Discovered in issue 627 .

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Mergedinto:** 672
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [go.spam....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/113385897513702662113/) on September 03, 2014 11:03:10_

It should be implemented as a two-sided card, see [1].

Currently, in can be cast for free, while it should only be castable when transforming Soul Seizer.

[1] http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=242498

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=678_
